metadata.reset:
1. Visit the Alarm.com dealer site.
2. Navigate to the Equipment page.
3. Click the 'emPower Devices' tab.
4. Open the 'Advanced Z-Wave Commands' menu by clicking the button below the Equipment List.
5. Click on the 'Reset To Factory Default' button.
6. Allow 3 minutes for the associated commands to go through and for the ADC-620T to act on them.
